= Details =
=Using Grails web-development framework for unit test development=

  ==*Work achieved this week:==
  *> Installed Grails into the development enviroment
  *> Wrote a simple application in grails.
  *> Wrote a basic unit test case to test the application wrote

  ==_Roadblocks_==
  *> Was not able to run the grails application.
  *> was not able to download BBB_web source codes

  ==_Details_==
  
  ===*Installing Grails:*===
  # Note: you have to have JDK 1.5.0.x installed and you JAVA_HOME is pointing to it.
  #1- You can download Grails from the following location http://grails.org/Download
  #2- Unzip the files to the location where you want Grails to be installed
  #3- Go to Control Panel->System->Advanced settings-> Environment variables and add a GRAILS_HOME to your system environment variables. Set the variables pointing to where grails is installed.
  #4- Add GRAILS_HOME\bin to your path.
